alloy: Neutral and versatile; good for general content and tutorials.
ash: Calm and soothing; good for relaxation and meditation content.
ballad: Melodic and musical; good for artistic and creative content.
coral: Bright and energetic; good for dynamic and upbeat content.
echo: Deep and resonant; good for authoritative and documentary narration.
fable: Warm and storytelling; good for narratives and audiobooks.
nova: Friendly and approachable; good for casual and conversational content.
onyx: Professional and clear; good for business and corporate content.
sage: Intellectual and measured; good for educational and explanatory content.
shimmer: Expressive and engaging; good for marketing and promotional content.
verse: Artistic and lyrical; good for poetry and creative writing.
marin: High-quality, natural tone; recommended for best overall quality.
cedar: High-quality, warm depth; recommended for best overall quality.
